events.message: I submitted a claim after my car was involved in a collision at the intersection last night.
The claim has been reviewed and categorized under auto accident for further processing.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your vehicle accident claim and will reach out soon.
Your claim regarding the car accident has been acknowledged and is now officially registered.
Please submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed.
All requested documents including the police report and photos have been submitted by the claimant.
The investigation of the car accident claim has officially started with the review of all materials.
The investigation concluded confirming fault and assessing damage to the insured vehicle.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage assessment and policy coverage.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the communication process.
The claim has been approved for payment following acceptance of the proposed settlement by the customer.
Payment has been issued to cover the repair costs of the vehicle as per the approved claim.
The claim is now closed after successful payment and completion of all procedures.
